text: Vivian Leona Mead Caver (June 13, 1928 â€“ August 22, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. Caver was the third African-American woman to serve in the Washington House of Representatives. She was a member of the state house from 1994 to 1995. She was a human rights activist.Lilian Caver, Washington State Legislature Member Biographies Caver was born in Jackson, Tennessee. Caver died on August 22, 2021 in Seattle, Washington at the age of 93.Vivian L. Caver, who fought for change in Seattle for more than half a century, dies at 93 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Politicians from Seattle Category:American human rights activists Category:People from Jackson, Tennessee Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Vivian Caver
